title: This Tucker Segment Blew My Mind (Ep 1703)
description:
Tucker aired an explosive segment last night about the FBI. In this episode I address the segment, and what I think really happened.

News Picks:


This story about Biden’s “smoking kits” program has the left, and the “fact-checkers” in panic mode. 


Inflation is getting worse.

Where are the leftist censors when it comes to this type of content?


This is how to fight back against liberal censors.


Exposed! How the media covers democrats vs. republicans lifting mask mandates. 

While Joe Rogan stood up for Trevor Noah, Noah threw Rogan under the bus.
